name: Angry Birds (itch) (Zoe Rowbotham)
description:
A simple Angry Birds clone with 2 levels. Use the mouse to click on the bird on the catapult, then drag to fire the bird in different directions, release the mouse click to fire.

My second piece of coursework for the Entertainment Software Development module in my Games Technology degree. Made using C++ and the ASGE game framework given to us that provides basic window and sprite functionality.
